validation.self_feedback: You cannot give feedback to yourself.
validation.min_days: You must be a member for at least {days} days to give feedback.
validation.min_posts: You must have at least {posts} posts to give feedback.
validation.already_given: You have already given feedback for this discussion.
validation.discussion_not_found: The specified discussion does not exist.
validation.discussion_required: Discussion URL or ID is required for feedback.
validation.already_reported: You have already reported this feedback.
validation.rate_limit_feedback: Please wait {seconds} seconds before submitting another feedback.
validation.rate_limit_report: Please wait {seconds} seconds before submitting another report.

form.title: Give feedback to {username}
form.discussion_help: Enter the discussion URL or ID related to this trade
form.comment_placeholder: Describe your trading experience with this user
form.error_too_short: Comment must be at least {min} characters
form.error_too_long: Comment must be at most {max} characters
form.error_discussion_required: Discussion URL or ID is required

feedback_page.no_feedback: This user has not received any feedback yet

feedback_item.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback?
feedback_item.no_permission_report: You don't have permission to perform this action

report_modal.title: Report Feedback
report_modal.reason_placeholder: Please provide a reason for reporting this feedback

discussion_actions.no_users_found: No other users found in this discussion
discussion_actions.showing_limited_users: Showing {shown} of {total} users. Use search to find others.
discussion_actions.showing_limited_results: Showing first {shown} of {total} matching users. Refine your search.

settings.title: Trader Feedback Settings
settings.require_discussion_help: Users must provide a discussion link when giving feedback
settings.one_per_discussion_help: Limit users to one feedback per discussion between same users
settings.min_days_help: Users must be a member for this many days before giving feedback (0 = disabled)
settings.min_posts_help: Users must have this many posts before giving feedback (0 = disabled)
settings.show_feedback_in_post_menu_label: Show 'Give Feedback' button in post menu
settings.show_feedback_in_post_menu_help: Adds 'Give Feedback' button to post dropdown menu (won't show on own posts)
settings.show_feedback_below_reply_help: Adds feedback button below reply and follow buttons in discussion sidebar
settings.show_feedback_in_post_footer_label: Show 'Give Feedback' button in post footer
settings.show_feedback_in_post_footer_help: Adds feedback button to the bottom-left of each post (won't show on own posts)
settings.footer_only_first_post_label: Show footer button only in first post
settings.footer_only_first_post_help: When enabled, the feedback button in post footer will only appear in the first post of discussions
settings.feedback_action_tag_filter_label: Show feedback buttons only in these tags
settings.feedback_action_tag_filter_help: Leave empty to show in all discussions. Select specific tags to limit button visibility to those tags only.
settings.feedback_only_when_locked_help: When enabled, feedback buttons will only appear in locked discussions (requires flarum-lock extension)
settings.show_badge_in_posts_help: Display user's trader score next to their username in forum posts
settings.badge_custom_prefix_help: Optional text to display before the badge (leave empty for no prefix)
settings.badge_format_help: Choose how the trader badge should be displayed
settings.badge_custom_format_help: Available variables: total, score, positive, neutral, negative (wrap in curly braces)
settings.badge_preview_sample: Sample data: 5 positive, 2 neutral, 1 negative (88% score)
settings.badge_tag_filter_label: Show badge only in these tags
settings.badge_tag_filter_help: Leave empty to show badge in all discussions. Select specific tags to limit badge display.
settings.badge_tag_filter_tags_required: Tags extension is required for tag filtering
settings.badge_only_first_post_label: Show badge only in first post
settings.badge_only_first_post_help: When enabled, the badge will only appear in the first post of discussions

reports.title: Reported Feedbacks
reports.confirm_approve: Are you sure you want to approve this feedback?
reports.confirm_reject: Are you sure you want to reject this feedback?
reports.confirm_dismiss: Are you sure you want to dismiss this report?
reports.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback? This action cannot be undone.

approvals.title: Pending Approvals
approvals.confirm_approve: Are you sure you want to approve this feedback?
approvals.confirm_reject: Are you sure you want to reject this feedback?
